original_theorem: (a) Union of open sets is open. (b) Intersection of closed sets is closed.
theorem_translation:
```lean4
theorem union_isOpen_and_inter_isClosed {α : Type*} [TopologicalSpace α] :
    (∀ (ι : Type*) (s : ι → Set α), (∀ i, IsOpen (s i)) → IsOpen (⋃ i, s i)) ∧
    (∀ (ι : Type*) (s : ι → Set α), (∀ i, IsClosed (s i)) → IsClosed (⋂ i, s i)) := by
```

import Mathlib
import Aesop

set_option maxHeartbeats 0
open BigOperators Real Nat Topology Rat Filter
theorem union_isOpen_and_inter_isClosed {α : Type*} [TopologicalSpace α] :
    (∀ (ι : Type*) (s : ι → Set α), (∀ i, IsOpen (s i)) → IsOpen (⋃ i, s i)) ∧
    (∀ (ι : Type*) (s : ι → Set α), (∀ i, IsClosed (s i)) → IsClosed (⋂ i, s i)) := by sorry

proof_steps.natural_language:
We assume:
• Let G be a collection of open sets in a metric space (X, d) [tc_1].
• Let S be the union of the sets in G, i.e., S = ∪_{g ∈ G} g [def_1].
• Let x₀ be an arbitrary point in S.
Therefore, we conclude:
• There exists an ε > 0 such that the open ball B(x₀, ε) is a subset of S [l1].
proof_steps.lean_tactics: rcases (isOpen_iff_nhds.mp hs hx₀i₀) with ⟨U, hU, hxU, hUs⟩

import Mathlib
import Aesop

set_option maxHeartbeats 0
open BigOperators Real Nat Topology Rat Filter
theorem union_isOpen_and_inter_isClosed {α : Type*} [TopologicalSpace α] :
    (∀ (ι : Type*) (s : ι → Set α), (∀ i, IsOpen (s i)) → IsOpen (⋃ i, s i)) ∧
    (∀ (ι : Type*) (s : ι → Set α), (∀ i, IsClosed (s i)) → IsClosed (⋂ i, s i)) := by
  constructor
  intro ι s hs
  rw [isOpen_iff_nhds]
  intro x₀ hx₀
  rcases (Set.mem_iUnion.mp hx₀) with ⟨i₀, hx₀i₀⟩
  specialize hs i₀
  rcases (isOpen_iff_nhds.mp hs) x₀ hx₀i₀ with ⟨U, hU, hxU, hUs⟩
  use U
  constructor
  exact hU
  constructor
  exact hxU
  apply Set.subset.trans hUs
  exact (Set.subset_iUnion s i₀)
  intro ι s hs
  rw [isClosed_iff_complement_isOpen]
  rw [Set.compl_iInter]
  apply isOpen_iUnion
  intro i
  rw [isClosed_iff_complement_isOpen] at hs
  exact hs i
  sorry

import Aesop

set_option maxHeartbeats 0
open BigOperators Real Nat Topology Rat Filter
theorem union_isOpen_and_inter_isClosed {α : Type*} [TopologicalSpace α] :
    (∀ (ι : Type*) (s : ι → Set α), (∀ i, IsOpen (s i)) → IsOpen (⋃ i, s i)) ∧
    (∀ (ι : Type*) (s : ι → Set α), (∀ i, IsClosed (s i)) → IsClosed (⋂ i, s i)) := by
